description: Let us know what it was like to use the app
questions: What did you think of the sign up experience? Did you have any issues navigating in the app?

description: Tell us about your experience being anonymous
questions: What do you value about being anon? Did you have any concerns? What did you think of anon posting on ZKitter and Heyanon?
How would you like to use the TAZ app in the future? What questions do you still have about Semaphore?

description: Share any thoughts related to the TAZ
